ask_expiry.description: Valid time range for Asks (min, max) in seconds

bid_expiry.description: Valid time range for Bids (min, max) in seconds

max_finders_fee_bps.description: Max basis points for the finders fee

min_price.description: Min value for bids and asks

operators.description: Operators are entites that are responsible for maintaining the active state of Asks. They listen to NFT transfer events, and update the active state of Asks.

sale_hook.description: The address of the airdrop claim contract to detect sales

stale_bid_duration.description: Duration after expiry when a bid becomes stale (in seconds)

trading_fee_bps.description: Fair Burn fee for winning bids 0.25% = 25, 0.5% = 50, 1% = 100, 2.5% = 250

Duration.description: Duration is a delta of time. You can add it to a BlockInfo or Expiration to move that further in the future. Note that an height-based Duration and a time-based Expiration cannot be combined
